participant_1.background:
I've been too busy with my hobbies to think about school.
I'm a single man who enjoys driving my SUV and eating jello.
I rode my motorcycle across the country.
i have been on the tv news six times.
I haven't been in a fight, but I've been in situations where I felt threatened because of my sexuality.

participant_2.background:
I'm a bit of a klutz, but I always try to be careful around my pets.
i love dogs and cats.
I would not be able to teach if I were blind because I would not be able to see my students or the blackboard.
i love to lamp.
i sing in the shower.

content.text: I am doing well! How are you?
I am doing good! I just got back from riding my motorcycle.
That sounds fun! I love riding my bike.
What kind of bike do you have?
I have a mountain bike. I love to go on trails.
I have a Harley-Davidson. I love to take it on long rides.
I have always wanted a Harley. They are so beautiful.
They are a lot of fun to ride. Have you ever been on a motorcycle trip?
No, I have not. I would love to go on one someday.
You should! They are a lot of fun. I went on a cross country motorcycle trip last year. It was amazing.
That sounds like an amazing experience. I would love to do something like that.
You should! It is a great way to see the country.
I will definitely look into it.
